name: 5.56mm Obsidian Round
description: 5.56mm Obsidian Rounds are an alternative to5.56mm Incendiary Roundsthat deal fire damage on hit and has a chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Although it may have a low percent chance of setting targets on fire, 5.56mm Obsidian Rounds excel when used against Fauna that have a weakness to fire, dealing more damage than5.56mm Rounds. A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewedhere.
